bludit-license: Bludit is released under the MIT license
head-description: Bludit is a web application to build your own web site or blog in seconds, it's completely free and open source. Bludit uses files in JSON format to store the content, you don't need to install or configure a database. You only need a web server with PHP support.
bludit-little-description-paragraph1: Create your own Web Site or Blog in seconds

documentation-description: Get information about Bludit, installation guide, requirements, upgrade guide, how to create content, how to insert an image, and more. Developers are welcome!
themes-and-plugins-description: Many users develop themes and extensions for Bludit. If you are a developer or you like to design themes, you can enter the forum and publish your work.
support-description: Bludit has its own forum and you can chat with other gurus who can help you with any question or issue, or just say hello to the community.
